author: zucchett
body:
#### PR description:

This PR updates the classification of the pixel material budget to the new materials introduced in the Phase-1 pixel simulation. This PR does not change neither the geometry nor the total material budget. This PR finalizes the material classification performed in the Validation/ package used to produce the material budget plots, and these plots are the only parts affected by this PR. The new plots, produced after the modification included in this PR, have been already approved and made public in CMS DP-2019/006.

#### PR validation:

The tests recommended in the PRWorkflow page have been run successfully, including runTheMatrix.py.
title: Pixel Phase-1 material budget classification
